sen.j: 鷺森神社（さぎもりじんじゃ、さぎのもりじんじゃ）は京都府京都市左京区にある神社。
sen.e: Saginomori-jinjya Shrine is a shrine, that is located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Saginomori-jinjya Shrine is a shrine, that is located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Saginomori-jinja Shrine is a shrine, that is located in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 毎年5月5日に例祭七里祭（さんやれ祭）が行われる。
sen.e: Reisai (regular festival) Shichiri Festival (also called Sanyare Festival) is held on every May 5th.
Reisai (regular festival) Shichiri Festival (also called Sanyare Festival) is held every May 5.
Reisai (regular festival) Shichiri Festival (also called Sanyare Festival) is held every May 5.

sen.j: 貞観 (日本)年間（859年～877年）の間に創建されたとされる。
sen.e: It is said that Saginomori-jinjya Shrine was erected during Jogan era (Japan) (in 859-877).
It is said that Saginomori-jinjya Shrine was erected during the Jogan era (Japan) (in 859-877).
It is said that Saginomori-jinja Shrine was erected during the Jogan era (Japan) (in 859-877).

sen.j: 比叡山山麓の七里の産土神であり、以前は修学寺の帝王と呼ばれたという。
sen.e: This shrine was Ubusunagami (guardian deity of one's birthplace) for seven villages at the foot of Mt. Hiei, and used to be called the monarch of 修学寺.
This shrine was Ubusunagami (guardian deity of one's birthplace) for seven villages at the foot of Mt. Hiei, and used to be called the monarch of 修学寺.
This shrine was Ubusunagami (guardian deity of one's birthplace) for seven villages at the foot of Mt. Hiei, and used to be called the monarch of 修学寺.

sen.j: 応仁の乱などにより、江戸時代初期に現在地に移ったとされる。
sen.e: Due to Onin War and other wars, it was relocated to the present place in the early Edo period.
Due to the Onin War and other wars, it was relocated to its present place in the early Edo period.
Due to the Onin War and other wars, it was relocated to its present place in the early Edo period.

sen.j: 京都市左京区修学院宮ノ脇町16
sen.e: 16脇ノ宮町 Syugakuin, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City
sen.cmt: 読み方不明。尚、脇ノ宮町は、宮ノ脇町（miyanowakicho）の間違えではないかと思われますが、原文のままにしました。http://www.doco-ico.net/kyoto/sightseeing/course/koyo/sagimori.htmlで、住所を確認しました。
sen.e: 16脇ノ宮町 Syugakuin, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City
16 Miyanowaki-cho, Shugakuin, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City
sen.cmt: スペル翻訳者コメントに合わせ、原文および訳文を修正

sen.j: 叡山電鉄叡山電鉄叡山本線 修学院駅から徒歩約6分。
sen.e: About a 6-minute walk from Eizan Electric Railway, Eizan Electric Railway Eizan Line, Shugakuin Station

sen.j: 京都市営バス 修学院道バス停留所から徒歩約6分。
sen.e: About a 6-minute walk from Kyoto City Bus, Shugakuin-michi Street Bus Stop.
